title: Manuel Carrillo III
description:
Manuel Carrillo III @mc3films is an automotive journalist and co-host of the new MotorTrend show, “Seduced by Speed”. The show tells the stories of weird, often illegal methods used to fund the construction of some of history's oddest -but sometimes most memorable- cars.


 

Check his show out here: https://watch.motortrend.com/tv-shows/seduced-by-speed/


 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire12 and use code smokingtire12 for 12 free meals, including free shipping!


Listen up! Raycon’s offering 15% off all their products for my listeners and here’s what you’ve gotta do to get it: go to BUYRAYCON.com/smoking
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (manuel carrillo)
